title: Juicy apple tart with creme fraiche
ingredients: ['Pastry', '115g butter, chilled', '70g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g plain flour', 'Filling and glaze', '3 to 4 granny smith apples', '325ml creme fraiche', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 small eggs', 'apricot jam', 'ground cinnamon mixed with sugar']
